Introduction

Park Sang Hyun, popularly known as Thunder, is a South Korean Singer and Actor under Lighthouse Entertainment. He is best known for debuting as a member of the boy group MBLAQ under J.Tune Camp and as the younger brother of Sandara Park.

Following his departure in MBLAQ back in 2014, he made his solo debut in December 2016.
